article_title: Rick Jensen: Broken Promises Flood Election Season
article_text:
Saint Johnsbury, VT (05819)

Today

Mostly cloudy early, then thunderstorms developing this afternoon. High around 85F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%..

Tonight

Mainly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.
